participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, Emily loves to express herself through baking and enjoys the joy it brings to others.
participant_1.background: I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day. I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews. I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business. I do yoga with my dog in the park every morning before work. my favorite author is stephen king.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: Reflective and content, John cherishes family moments and seeks new experiences while maintaining a simple lifestyle.
participant_2.background: I collect memories with my wife. I am content with my simple life, but I do miss the occasional social interaction. I am saving up for some procedures while trying to find ways to increase my income. I am moving to a new city because my family is relocating. i have never been to the west coast of the united states.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for fun?
I collect memories with my wife. What about you?
I love to create beautiful wedding cakes. I'm a self taught baker who's been doing this for about 5 years now. I've been in a bit of a rut lately, so I'm looking for some new inspiration.
That's awesome! I love to watch cooking shows and try new recipes. I'm not much of a baker, but I love to try new things.
I love to watch cooking shows too! I find them so relaxing. I'm really into baking bread lately. Have you ever made your own bread?
No, I've never tried making my own bread. I'm not sure if I'd be very good at it.
It's actually not that hard! There are a ton of great recipes online. If you're ever interested, I could send you one of my favorites.
That would be great! Thanks! I'm always looking for new ways to challenge myself.
You're welcome! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks! I appreciate the vote of confidence.
No problem! Have you ever been to the west coast of the United States?
No, I've never been to the west coast. I've always wanted to go, though. I hear it's beautiful.
It is! I've been to California a few times and it's one of my favorite places. I love the mountains and the ocean.
That sounds amazing! I'm definitely adding that to my list of places to visit.
You should! It's definitely worth it
